summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Croatian Real Estate Management System. All major functionalities are working correctly including Croatian dashboard with euros, property management with K.O. and cadastral parcels, tenant management with OIB and IBAN, tabbed forms, search functionality, and responsive design. Backend API endpoints are fully functional with proper Croatian entities and status codes.

accessibility_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for modal dialogs
accessibility_issues.details: Console warnings appear when opening property and tenant creation modals

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint with Croatian message
Dashboard Croatian metrics (ukupno_nekretnina, aktivni_ugovori, ugovori_na_isteku, aktivni_podsjetnici, mjesecni_prihod)
Property CRUD operations with Croatian fields (katastarska_opcina, broj_kat_cestice, vlasnik, udio_vlasnistva)
Tenant CRUD operations with Croatian fields (OIB, sjedište, kontakt_ime, IBAN)
Contract CRUD operations with Croatian fields (interna_oznaka, osnovna_zakupnina, indeksacija)
Document CRUD operations with Croatian document types (zemljisnoknjizni_izvadak)
Croatian navigation system (Dashboard, Nekretnine, Zakupnici, Ugovori, Dokumenti, Podsjećanja)
Dashboard display with Croatian labels and Euro currency (€)
Property form with Croatian tabs (Osnovni podaci, Financije, Održavanje, Rizici)
Property form with Croatian fields (Naziv nekretnine, Katastarska općina, Broj kat. čestice, Površina, Vlasnik, Udio vlasništva)
Tenant form with Croatian fields (Naziv firme, OIB/VAT ID, Sjedište, Kontakt osoba, IBAN)
Search functionality with Croatian results display
Data persistence and integration between frontend and backend
Croatian language interface throughout the application

success_percentage.frontend: 98% (All major Croatian features working, 1 minor accessibility issue)

action_item_for_E1: Consider adding proper aria-describedby attributes to modal dialogs for better accessibility compliance. All core Croatian functionality is working perfectly with proper Croatian language support, Euro currency display, and Croatian-specific fields (K.O., cadastral parcels, OIB, IBAN).

additional_notes.croatian_language_verification: Confirmed Croatian language interface throughout: 'Upravljanje nekretninama', 'Nekretnine', 'Zakupnici', 'Ugovori', 'Dokumenti', 'Podsjećanja'
additional_notes.croatian_fields_verification: Verified Croatian-specific fields: Katastarska općina, Broj kat. čestice, Vlasnik, Udio vlasništva, OIB, Sjedište, IBAN
additional_notes.currency_verification: Confirmed Euro (€) currency display on dashboard and throughout the application
additional_notes.form_tabs_verification: Verified Croatian form tabs: Osnovni podaci, Financije, Održavanje, Rizici
additional_notes.search_functionality: Croatian search (pretraga) working with categories: nekretnine, zakupnici, ugovori
additional_notes.dashboard_metrics: Croatian dashboard showing: ukupno_nekretnina: 2, aktivni_ugovori: 1, mjesecni_prihod: 800€
additional_notes.responsive_design: Application responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
additional_notes.api_integration: Perfect integration between Croatian frontend and backend APIs
additional_notes.contract_features: Croatian contract features: interna_oznaka, indeksacija, CAM troškovi
